Calculate all ratio pairs

exprsToRatios-methods.Rd

Calculations all possible ratios for the assayData columns in an "MSnSet".

Methods

signature(object = "MSnSet", log = "logical")

If log is FALSE (default) the ratios for all the assayData columns are computed; otherwise, log ratios (differences) are calculated.

Examples

library("pRolocdata")
data(dunkley2006)
x <- dunkley2006[, 1:3]
head(exprs(x))
#>              M1F1A    M1F4A    M1F7A
#> AT1G09210 0.323250 0.275500 0.216000
#> AT1G21750 0.332000 0.279667 0.222000
#> AT1G51760 0.397250 0.246500 0.168250
#> AT1G56340 0.336733 0.303267 0.201133
#> AT2G32920 0.328800 0.302900 0.192100
#> AT2G47470 0.343714 0.295286 0.195000
r <- exprsToRatios(x)
#> Dropping protocolData.
head(exprs(r))
#>                  1        2        3
#> AT1G09210 1.173321 1.496528 1.275463
#> AT1G21750 1.187126 1.495495 1.259761
#> AT1G51760 1.611562 2.361070 1.465082
#> AT1G56340 1.110352 1.674181 1.507793
#> AT2G32920 1.085507 1.711609 1.576783
#> AT2G47470 1.164004 1.762636 1.514287
pData(r)
#>   ratio.description
#> 1       M1F1A/M1F4A
#> 2       M1F1A/M1F7A
#> 3       M1F4A/M1F7A
